name: Angelic Gift
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying.

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
—Yurin, royal assassin

name: Auger Spree
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Aurora Champion
oracle_text: Whenever Aurora Champion attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, tap target creature.
flavor_text: Many combatants at Valor's Reach wield glowing weapons to distract their enemies and delight the crowd.

name: Azra Bladeseeker
oracle_text: When Azra Bladeseeker enters the battlefield, each player on your team may discard a card, then each player who discarded a card this way draws a card.
flavor_text: "Never get too attached to a weapon. You must allow a better one to find its way to you."

name: Bathe in Dragonfire
oracle_text: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The scent of cooked flesh lingers in the charred landscape of Tarkir.

name: Battle Rampart
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword."
—Yannash, outpost builder

name: Benthic Giant
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Bloodborn Scoundrels
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
When Bloodborn Scoundrels enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The ring plays host to some combatants that the spectators love to hate.

name: Borderland Marauder
oracle_text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

name: Bull-Rush Bruiser
oracle_text: Whenever Bull-Rush Bruiser attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Bull-Rush Bruiser gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: There will always be a spot at Valor's Reach for headlong violence.

name: Call to Heel
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.
flavor_text: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

name: Centaur Healer
oracle_text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

name: Champion of Arashin
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "The blood of Dromoka and the blood of my veins are the same."

name: Charging Binox
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.)
Trample
flavor_text: Arena beasts are bred for flashiness and foul temper. An extra head addresses both requirements.

name: Charging Rhino
oracle_text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: The knights of Troinir Keep took the rhino as their emblem due to its intense focus when charging down a perceived threat—a trait they discovered on a hunting excursion.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Combo Attack
oracle_text: Two target creatures your team controls each deal damage equal to their power to target creature.
flavor_text: Success at Valor's Reach requires not only individual skill but also the ability to merge that skill with a partner's.

name: Consulate Skygate
oracle_text:
Defender
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: All skyships entering or leaving the fairgrounds must pass through the security checkpoint.

name: Coralhelm Guide
oracle_text: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Cowl Prowler
flavor_text: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost—occasionally permanently—in the city's wildest greenbelt.

name: Daggerback Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Daggerdrome Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

name: Doomed Dissenter
oracle_text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Dragon Hatchling
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

name: Dwarven Lightsmith
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.)
When Dwarven Lightsmith enters the battlefield, creatures your team controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Eager Construct
oracle_text: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.

name: Earth Elemental
flavor_text: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

name: Elvish Visionary
oracle_text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

name: Ember Beast
oracle_text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

name: Expedite
oracle_text:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "I run, and thunder follows."

name: Expedition Raptor
oracle_text:
Flying
When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

name: Eyeblight Assassin
oracle_text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

name: Fan Favorite
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
{2}: Fan Favorite gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: "Pathetic! I've heard more noise in a monastery. Let me hear you, Valor's Reach!"

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.

name: Fill with Fright
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Frost Lynx
oracle_text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants."
—Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2

name: Grotesque Mutation
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Hand of Silumgar
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Silumgar trains those whom he favors in his magic, granting them the ability to spread his disdain across the land.

name: Hexplate Golem
flavor_text:
"Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause."
—Ezuri, renegade leader

name: Huddle Up
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell's cost.)
Two target players each draw a card.
flavor_text: "Are you sure this is going to work?" asked Will. "No," said Rowan. "But if it does, it's going to be spectacular."

name: Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

name: Jungle Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Jungle Wayfinder enters the battlefield, each player may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: She is adept at navigating the stadium's ever-changing landscape.

name: Kitesail Corsair
oracle_text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

name: Kraken Hatchling
flavor_text: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

name: Kraul Warrior
oracle_text: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

name: Last Gasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

name: Lead by Example
oracle_text: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
flavor_text: Gideon and Nissa carved a path through the Eldrazi swarm, and their Zendikari allies charged into the fray behind them.

name: Lightning Talons
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"The victim was either clawed to death or struck by lightning. Possibly both."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Lightwalker
oracle_text: Lightwalker has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"The greatest gift Dromoka gives is the ability to fly without wings."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Liturgy of Blood
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Magma Hellion
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
Trample, haste
flavor_text: The stadium is well-stocked with hazards to force the action if combatants show too much caution.

name: Midnight Guard
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Midnight Guard.
flavor_text:
"When you're on watch, no noise is harmless and no shadow can be ignored."
—Olgard of the Skiltfolk

name: Millennial Gargoyle
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"You've got to keep your wits about you on the roofs. Not all stones are compliant handholds."
—Iveta, rooftop runner

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text:
"It is fascinating to see how the people of this plane replicate magical techniques without a natural gift. Also frustrating."
—Jace Beleren

name: Night Market Guard
oracle_text: Night Market Guard can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text:
"One head watches for Consulate enforcers. The other watches for renegade thieves."
—Crime Lord Gonti

name: Nimbus of the Isles
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The people of the Sevick Isles have a unique understanding of the term "ominous clouds."

name: Omenspeaker
oracle_text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Painful Lesson
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"You wish to remember this lesson? I will write it down for you."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Pathmaker Initiate
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "The expected way through the trial is far too tedious."

name: Peace Strider
oracle_text: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."
—Kessla, Sylvok shaman

name: Pierce Strider
oracle_text: When Pierce Strider enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Prakhata Club Security
flavor_text: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

name: Primal Huntbeast
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"To the unskilled, it appears as blurred patches of distorted light. Few have seen its true form."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Raptor Companion
flavor_text: A raptor will follow any order as long as that order is "hunt," "kill," or "go for the guts."

name: Rebuke
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text:
"No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Reckless Reveler
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Reckless Reveler: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"The gods of Theros are born of the expectations and beliefs of mortals. If I have found godhood, what does that say about their true desires?"
—Xenagos, god of revels

name: Return to the Earth
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Dragons are feared for their breath and their bite, but it is their wings that make them unconquerable. Bring them to earth, and they die like any other beast."
—Kassur, Sultai hunter

name: Rhox Brute
flavor_text:
"In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice."
—Gernan, Dawnray archer

name: Riptide Crab
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: It sleeps with its claws open.

name: Rotfeaster Maggot
oracle_text: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.
flavor_text: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

name: Royal Trooper
oracle_text: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Loyalty guides me. Pride compels me. Anger sustains me. And the pay isn't bad."

name: Saddleback Lagac
oracle_text: When Saddleback Lagac enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)
flavor_text:
"A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one … well, it's a tasty dinner."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Saltwater Stalwart
oracle_text: Whenever Saltwater Stalwart deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.
flavor_text: Every attack is a test of your defenses. Every hit marks the map of your defeat.

name: Screeching Buzzard
oracle_text:
Flying
When Screeching Buzzard dies, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"A shrill creature that delights in the misery of others—what's not to love?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Seer's Lantern
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: A light to bring hope in dark times.

name: Shambling Ghoul
oracle_text: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

name: Shoulder to Shoulder
oracle_text:
Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight."
—Gideon Jura

name: Sickle Dancer
oracle_text: Whenever Sickle Dancer attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Sickle Dancer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I lead, destruction follows."

name: Silverchase Fox
oracle_text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den."
—Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

name: Skyshroud Claim
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

name: Skystreamer
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {4} of this spell's cost.)
Flying
When Skystreamer enters the battlefield, target player gains 4 life.
flavor_text: Victories at Valor's Reach are broadcast via griffins in the sky above.

name: Soaring Show-Off
oracle_text:
Flying
When Soaring Show-Off enters the battlefield, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Some spectators love an underdog, but others are just as happy to support a proven winner.

name: Sparring Mummy
oracle_text: When Sparring Mummy enters the battlefield, untap target creature.
flavor_text: Aspiring to earn their place in the afterlife, acolytes train every day against those who fell short of that glory.

name: Spellweaver Duo
oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.)
When Spellweaver Duo enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Synchronized spell weaving is a difficult but rewarding skill to master.

name: Stadium Vendors
oracle_text: When Stadium Vendors enters the battlefield, choose a player. That player adds two mana of any one color they choose.
flavor_text: "Potions! Mana potions, health potions, energy potions—get your potions here!"

name: Stone Golem
flavor_text: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul into his work. But the newly awakened golem decided it wanted its creator's other, more tangible parts.

name: Tandem Tactics
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

name: Thunder Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

name: Tyrant's Machine
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"Though tempered differently, all wills can be broken."
—Inquisitor Kyrik

name: Urborg Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Urborg Drake attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.

name: Wandering Wolf
oracle_text: Creatures with power less than Wandering Wolf's power can't block it.
flavor_text: Humans still feared wolves, though no connection between them and the curse of lycanthropy had ever been proved.

name: Watercourser
oracle_text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow."
—Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

name: Wrap in Flames
oracle_text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Yotian Soldier
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Poets dream the verses of otherworldly stories. Artificers dream the blueprints of otherplanar artifacts.
